revision.text:
The titles on this list are full-fledged games developed using ZDoom or GZDoom as their engine.
* Action Doom 2: Urban Brawl [http://action.mancubus.net/] * The Adventures of Square [http://adventuresofsquare.com/index.php] * The Age of Hell
